name: Valentine's Day Red Velvet Truffles Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: red velvet cake mix, cream cheese, white chocolate chips, topping of your choice
recipeIngredient: 1 box red velvet cake mix, prepared according to instructions
recipeInstructionSteps: Prepare red velvet cake according to instructions on box.
In a bowl, crumble the red velvet cake.
Mix in cream cheese until smooth.
Roll into 1- to 2-Tbsp.-sized balls, and chill.
Roll the balls in the chocolate to coat evenly. Set aside.
Decorate! Let the chocolate harden before serving.
